```{r}
library(ggmap)
#ggmap::register_google(key = "AIzaSyDuPPc0wa_4OY7iKG_bi6S2OXwxr8m6zRo", write = TRUE)

florida_map <- get_map( getbb('florida'), source="stamen")

locations <- data.frame(lat = c(25.6763, 25.77044),
                               lon = c(-80.0987, -80.15235))

ggmap(florida_map) + geom_point(data = locations, aes(x = lon, y = lat), color = "orange", size = 4)
```
